column1: #Text=Actress Katara says : " I just wanted to let you know , Aang , that I 'll always love you .
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " Hey Toph , would you say you and Aang have a " rocky relationship " ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I told him to say that !
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " I hope everyone 's ready for the Invasion !
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " We finally made it to the Royal Palace , but no one 's home !
#Text=" Actor Zuko says : " Actually , I 'm home , and I want to join you !
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " I guess we have no choice .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I guess that 's it .
#Text=The play 's caught up to the present now .
#Text=" Suki says : " Wait , the play 's not over !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But it is over , unless ... this is the future .
